metadata.titleEn: ChinaHighSO2: High-resolution and High-quality Ground-level SO2 Dataset for China (2013-2023)
metadata.titleCn: 中国高分辨率高质量地面SO2数据集（2013-2023）
metadata.description: ChinaHighSO2 is one of the series of long-term, full-coverage, high-resolution, and high-quality datasets of ground-level air pollutants for China (i.e., ChinaHighAirPollutants, CHAP). It is generated from the big data (e.g., ground-based measurements, satellite remote sensing products, atmospheric reanalysis, and model simulations) using artificial intelligence by considering the spatiotemporal heterogeneity of air pollution. This is the big data-derived seamless (spatial coverage = 100%) daily, monthly, and yearly 1 km (i.e., D1K, M1K, and Y1K) ground-level SO2 dataset in China from 2013 to present. Note that this dataset is 10 km before 2019, and improved to 1 km after 2019. This dataset yields a high quality with a cross-validation coefficient of determination (CV-R2) value of of 0.84 and a root-mean-square error (RMSE) of 10.07 µg m-3 for the daily retrievals, respectively. Note that this dataset is continuously updated, and if you want to apply for more data or have any questions, please contact me (Email: weijing_rs@163.com; weijing@umd.edu). The data file contains four codes (Python, Matlab, IDL and R language) nc2geotiff codes for NC to GeoTiff.
metadata.descriptionCn: ChinaHighSO2数据集是中国高分辨率高质量近地表空气污染物数据集（ChinaHighAirPollutants, CHAP）中地面SO2数据集。该数据集利用人工智能技术，考虑了空气污染的时空异质特性，从大数据（如地基观测、卫星遥感产品、大气再分析和模式模拟资料等）中生产得到2013年至今全国无缝隙地面SO2数据，数据十折交叉验证决定系数R2为0.84，均方根误差RMSE为10.07 µg/m3。主要范围为整个中国地区，空间分辨率2019年之前为10 km，2019年之后为1 km，时间分辨率为日、月、年，单位为µg/m3注意：该数据集持续更新，如需要更多数据，请发邮件联系作者（weijing_rs@163.com; weijing@umd.edu）。
metadata.instructions: File Name: The data is stored in the NetCDF file format, and the file name is CHAP_SO2_ab_yyyymmdd_V1.nc, where a represents time resolution (D represents daily data, M represents monthly data, Y represents annual data), b represents spatial resolution (1K represents 1km), yyyy represents year, mm represents month, and dd represents day. Data reading method: Python, Matlab, IDL, and other programming methods can be used to convert files from NC to TIF. The data coordinate system is WGS-1984, with a background value of 65535.
metadata.instructionsCn: 文件命名：该数据以NetCDF文件格式存储，文件的名称为CHAP_SO2_ab_yyyymmdd_V1.nc，其中a表示时间分辨率（D表示日数据，M表示月数据，Y表示年数据），b表示空间分辨率（1K表示1km），yyyy代表年，mm表示月，dd表示日。数据读取方式：可用Python、Matlab、IDL等编程实现文件从nc到tif的转换。数据坐标系为WGS-1984，背景值为65535。

literatureList.titleEn: Ground-level gaseous pollutants (NO2, SO2, and CO) in China: daily seamless mapping and spatiotemporal variations
literatureList.referenceEn: Wei, J., Li, Z., Wang, J., Li, C., Gupta, P., & Cribb, M. (2023). Ground-level gaseous pollutants (NO2, SO2, and CO) in China: daily seamless mapping and spatiotemporal variations. Atmospheric Chemistry and Physics, 23, 1511–1532. https://doi.org/10.5194/acp-23-1511-2023

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the main features and specifications of a dataset that utilizes artificial intelligence for high-resolution, high-quality ground-level SO2 data collection in China from 2013 to the present?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 利用人工智能进行中国2013年至今高分辨率、高质量地面SO2数据收集的数据集的主要特征和规格是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: spatio-temporal heterogeneity, big data sources, cross-validation R2 of 0.84, RMSE of 10.07 µg/m3, spatial resolution of 10 km prior to 2019, spatial resolution of 1 km post-2019, temporal resolution includes daily, monthly, and yearly data, measured in µg/m3
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 时空异质性，大数据来源，交叉验证R²为0.84，RMSE为10.07 µg/m³，2019年之前的空间分辨率为10公里，2019年之后的空间分辨率为1公里，时间分辨率包括每日、每月和每年数据，单位为µg/m³。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the spatial resolution in kilometers of a dataset on near-surface SO2 levels in China before 2019?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 2019年前中国近地面二氧化硫水平数据集的空间分辨率是多少公里？

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the spatial resolution of a dataset with 10 km resolution before 2019 compare to one with 1 km resolution after 2019 in terms of capturing spatial heterogeneity of ground-level SO2 across China?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在2019年之前，分辨率为10公里的数据集与2019年之后分辨率为1公里的数据集在捕捉中国地面二氧化硫空间异质性方面的比较如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The spatial resolution of 10 km before 2019 is coarser compared to the 1 km resolution after 2019. The finer 1 km resolution is likely to capture spatial heterogeneity of ground-level SO2 across China more accurately, providing more detailed insights into local variations in pollution levels.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 2019年前的10公里空间分辨率较粗，而2019年后的1公里分辨率较细。更细的1公里分辨率可能更准确地捕捉到中国地面二氧化硫的空间异质性，为污染水平的地方变化提供更详细的见解。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the primary reasons for employing artificial intelligence techniques in the data collection process of high-resolution ground-level SO2 datasets in China?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在中国高分辨率地面二氧化硫（SO2）数据集的数据收集过程中，采用人工智能技术的主要原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Artificial intelligence techniques are employed to account for the spatiotemporal heterogeneity of air pollution and to process large-scale data from various sources such as ground-based observations, satellite remote sensing products, atmospheric reanalysis, and model simulations, ensuring the production of seamless ground-level SO2 data across China.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 人工智能技术被用于考虑空气污染的时空异质性，并处理来自地面观测、卫星遥感产品、大气重分析和模型模拟等多种来源的大规模数据，确保在中国生产无缝的地面SO2数据。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives of employing artificial intelligence techniques in creating a dataset for high-resolution SO2 measurements across China from 2013 to 2023?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在2013年至2023年期间，采用人工智能技术创建中国高分辨率SO2测量数据集的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The use of artificial intelligence techniques aims to account for the spatiotemporal heterogeneity of air pollution and to produce a seamless, high-resolution dataset of ground-level SO2 measurements across China. This is achieved by integrating data from various large-scale sources such as ground observations, satellite remote sensing products, atmospheric reanalysis, and model simulations.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 使用人工智能技术旨在考虑空气污染的时空异质性，并生成中国境内地面二氧化硫（SO2）测量的无缝高分辨率数据集。这是通过整合来自各种大规模来源的数据实现的，包括地面观测、卫星遥感产品、大气重分析和模型模拟。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies can be employed to integrate various data sources, such as satellite remote sensing products and atmospheric reanalysis, to produce high-resolution ground-level SO2 datasets in China?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 可以采用哪些方法论来整合各种数据源，如卫星遥感产品和大气重分析，以生成中国高分辨率地面SO2数据集？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To produce high-resolution ground-level SO2 datasets in China, artificial intelligence techniques are utilized to account for the spatiotemporal heterogeneity of air pollution. This involves integrating big data sources like ground observations, satellite remote sensing products, atmospheric reanalysis, and model simulation data, ensuring a seamless nationwide dataset from 2013 to the present.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了在中国生成高分辨率的地面SO2数据集，采用人工智能技术来考虑空气污染的时空异质性。这涉及整合大数据源，如地面观测、卫星遥感产品、大气重分析和模型模拟数据，确保从2013年至今的全国无缝数据集。
